trans-unit.source: This class describes a schema importer, which transforms an XML schema into corresponding code entities.
trans-unit.target: 此类描述一个架构导入程序，这将 XML 架构转换为相应的代码实体。

trans-unit.source: The SchemaImporter class is the parent class of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> class, which implements this functionality.
trans-unit.target: SchemaImporter 类是的父类<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter>类，该类实现了此功能。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of schema importer extensions.
trans-unit.target: 获取架构导入程序扩展的集合。

trans-unit.source: Schema importer extensions modify the behavior of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> objects.
trans-unit.target: 架构导入程序扩展修改的行为<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter>对象。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter>

trans-unit.source: By adding <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension> objects to this collection, you can customize the code generated by specific schema patterns.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension>对象添加到此集合中，你可以自定义由特定的架构模式生成的代码。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Configuration.SchemaImporterExtensionElementCollection"></xref> containing a collection of schema importer extensions.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Configuration.SchemaImporterExtensionElementCollection"> </xref>包含架构导入程序扩展的集合。
